article_title: China seeks to unite Palestinian factions with reconciliation deal
sentence: Hamas  has  lost  control  in  Gaza  since  the  war  with  Israel  began  on  7  October  with  Hamas's  unprecedented  attack  on  Israel,  in  which  it  killed  about  1,200  people  and  took  251  others  back  to  Gaza  as  hostages.

article_title: China seeks to unite Palestinian factions with reconciliation deal
sentence: More  than  39,000  Palestinians  have  been  killed  in  Gaza  as  a  result  of  the  Israeli  offensive,  according  to  the  territory's  Hamas-run  health  ministry.
